item.description:
Save the Date!
This afterwork set will be organized by my company Boston Offline and will have meetup and non-meetup folks in attendance.
Early arrival is recommended. There will be a fun icebreaker activity beginning around 7pm to facilitate networking.

The venue offers free parking behind the building for 60 cars. Metered street parking is also available. Use mbta.com's trip planner or Google maps if you're coming by T and not familiar with the area.

Business casual/Upscale attire is requested. The weather is projected to be a relatively warm 50 degrees!

Ask for the Cocktails & Connections event when you arrive.
item.name: Cocktails & Connections MegaMeetup
